name: theme-pathways
title: Pathways Educational Theme
author: NOLA Education <team@nolaeducation.org>
description: Age-appropriate theme for high school learners (ages 14-18) with modern design patterns and balanced visual hierarchy

files.content:
{
  "$schema": "https://ui.shadcn.com/schema/registry-item.json",
  "name": "theme-pathways",
  "type": "registry:theme",
  "title": "Pathways Educational Theme",
  "description": "Age-appropriate theme for high school learners (ages 14-18) with modern design patterns and balanced visual hierarchy",
  "categories": ["education", "theme", "pathways", "high-school"],
  "author": "NOLA Education <team@nolaeducation.org>",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "cssVars": {
    "light": {
      "background": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "foreground": "oklch(0.15 0 0)",
      "card": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "card-foreground": "oklch(0.15 0 0)",
      "popover": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "popover-foreground": "oklch(0.15 0 0)",
      "primary": "oklch(0.50 0.20 185)",
      "primary-foreground": "oklch(0.95 0 0)",
      "secondary": "oklch(0.40 0.25 270)",
      "secondary-foreground": "oklch(0.95 0 0)",
      "muted": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "muted-foreground": "oklch(0.45 0 0)",
      "accent": "oklch(0.65 0.30 25)",
      "accent-foreground": "oklch(0.95 0 0)",
      "destructive": "oklch(0.65 0.28 20)",
      "destructive-foreground": "oklch(0.95 0 0)",
      "border": "oklch(0.92 0.03 185)",
      "input": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "ring": "oklch(0.50 0.20 185)",
      "chart-1": "oklch(0.50 0.20 185)",
      "chart-2": "oklch(0.55 0.22 200)",
      "chart-3": "oklch(0.40 0.25 270)",
      "chart-4": "oklch(0.65 0.30 25)",
      "chart-5": "oklch(0.45 0.18 300)",
      "sidebar": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "sidebar-foreground": "oklch(0.15 0 0)",
      "sidebar-primary": "oklch(0.50 0.20 185)",
      "sidebar-primary-foreground": "oklch(0.95 0 0)",
      "sidebar-accent": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "sidebar-accent-foreground": "oklch(0.15 0 0)",
      "sidebar-border": "oklch(0.90 0.04 185)",
      "sidebar-ring": "oklch(0.50 0.20 185)",
      "radius": "0.625rem"
    }
  },
  "meta": {
    "educationalContext": {
      "ageGroup": "14-18",
      "cognitiveLevel": "high-school",
      "touchTargetMin": "44px",
      "contrastRatio": "standard",
      "visualComplexity": "balanced",
      "wcagLevel": "AA"
    },
    "designTokens": {
      "fontSizeBase": "15px",
      "lineHeightBase": "1.5",
      "focusWidth": "2px",
      "borderRadius": "0.625rem",
      "minTouchTarget": "44px"
    },
    "colorPalette": {
      "primary": "Teal - Modern and trustworthy",
      "secondary": "Purple - Creative and inspiring",
      "accent": "Coral - Energetic and social",
      "destructive": "Warm Red - Clear but not alarming",
      "neutral": "Cool Grays - Contemporary and clean"
    },
    "designPrinciples": [
      "Modern aesthetics that appeal to teenagers",
      "Balanced visual hierarchy for complex information",
      "Contemporary color palette with social appeal",
      "Collaborative-friendly interface elements",
      "Career-exploration focused design patterns"
    ]
  }
}
